name: Be Tiny, World!
description:
Be Tiny, World! is a game that was originally made within 72 hours for Ludum Dare 23. The game got expanded and improved after the challenge was over, and this is the result.

The objective of the game is to survive as long as possible by shooting the planets with your shrink ray in order to keep from crashing into them.

The Android version includes achievements and leaderboards with Google Play Game Services. It can also be found on the Google Play Store.

The game can also be played in the browser.
